QuestData.Title: Harpoon Master Yavus
QuestData.Description: That was a fairly strong showing at Baleheim, $n. Before you go off patting yourself on the back there's work to be done at Nifflevar.$B$BWe've located the vrykul responsible for the majority of the harpoon attacks on our frigates - goes by the name of Yavus. You'll find him in the main harpoon structure on the bluffs of Nifflevar, southeast of here.$B$BTrack him down and execute him for crimes against the Alliance!$B$BDo me proud, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Lieutenant Icehammer in the Howling Fjord wants you to slay Harpoon Master Yavus at Nifflevar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you taken care of Yavus?
QuestData.RewardText: It'll take them a while to find a replacement for Yavus. Now is the perfect time to unleash Zorek's plan! While they're scurrying to regain control of Nifflevar, you're going to use their own harpoon guns against them!
